author: craigmcc
msg: Add the new shale-view module as a module in shale-parent (so it will get
built with the others), and add it to the assembly output as well.

author: dbertoni
msg: Fixed some bugs where the literal 0 was being used as the value of an invalid file handle.  This affects platforms like Solaris, which use open/close, etc., instead of fopen/fclose, etc.  Removed unnecessary transcoding of file names, that resulted in round-trip transcoding.  Moved calls to initializer list to avoid initializing to a default value.

author: mriou
msg: Zip can be weird sometimes, asking you to unpack files without the dirs to which they belong.

author: peterreilly
msg: add a comment about /etc/ant.conf and about quotes and / in ANT_HOME,CLASSPATH and JAVA_HOME

author: pmcmahan
msg: fix a typo in the description for the JMX explorer portlet
